text: Peristernia marquesana is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Peristernia marquesana (A. Adams, 1855). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=723041 on 2020-06-11 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1855
title: Peristernia marquesana
